text: Karlie Kloss has seen the headlines that her friendship with Taylor Swift is apparently over because she had sushi one night with a group of friends that included Swift's frenemy Katy Perry. But, sleep easy, Jennifer Lawrence and all other concerned Kaylor fans : EVERYTHING IS OKAY. Really! Kloss just assured the New York Times! When the outlet asked her about the status of her and Swift's friendship in a new interview, Kloss replied, “ Don ’ t believe everything you read.'' So, Kloss'` ` Swish Swish'' caption and Perry hangout truly do mean nothing? The NYT noted that Kloss and Swift ` ` continue to be good friends, and they talk frequently.'' Imagine all the laughing - cat
